original_text: The Lord says this to Zion's people: ‘You have received very bad wounds. Nobody can make you well again. The Lord says this to Zion's people:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 네 상처는 고칠 수 없고 네 부상은 중하도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord says this to Zion's people
You have received very bad wounds
Nobody can make you well again
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 당신을 다시 낫게 할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord says this to Zion's people
